name: Shockwaves
description:
Shockwaves redefines the puzzle genre with its unique gameplay. Your goal: strategically place numbers to unleash powerful shockwaves, merging and pushing numbers together. Navigate through an endless mode or tackle 25 mind-bending puzzles.

FEATURES:
ENDLESS MODE: Dive into a continuous challenge, creating shockwaves to achieve the highest score.

PUZZLES: Solve 25 intricate puzzles, each requiring strategic moves and clever thinking.

LEADERBOARDS: Showcase your skills on integrated leaderboards.
